data.Name: ZelCash website
data.Description: Main ZelCash website where you can find all the information about ZelCash, its projects, roadmap, team and lot more.

data.Name: ZelCore website
data.Description: Main ZelCore website where you can find all the information about ZelCore, downloads, roadmap, and more.

data.Name: Zel ID website
data.Description: Main Zel ID website where you can find all the information about Zel ID, d2FA, Easy Login, and more.

data.Name: ZelCash Infopage
data.Description: ZelCash infopage aims to offer all information about Zel Technologies and lists it in a user friendly way.

data.Name: ZelCash WebWallet
data.Description: WebWallet is an easy to use ZelCash wallet. There is no need to download any file, simply create a wallet by entering your secret phrase.

data.Name: ZelCash explorer
data.Description: Main ZelCash explorer showing all transactions and blocks. Based on Bitcoin Insight explorer, offering a powerful API.

data.Name: ZelCash explorer 2
data.Description: Backup ZelCash explorer showing all transactions and blocks. Based on Bitcoin Insight explorer, offering a powerful API.

data.Name: ZelCash explorer 3
data.Description: Backup ZelCash explorer 2 showing all transactions and blocks. Based on Bitcoin Insight explorer, offering a powerful API.

data.Name: ZelCash explorer for ZelCore
data.Description: ZelCash explorer used in ZelCore platform showing all transactions and blocks. Based on Bitcoin Insight explorer, offering a powerful API.

data.Name: ZelCash rates
data.Description: Main ZelCash rates API showing ZelCash price in BTC and about 150 fiat currencies. Feel free to pull data from it for your site!

data.Name: ZelCash rates for ZelCore
data.Description: ZelCash rates server used inside ZelCore. API shows ZelCash price in BTC and about 150 fiat currencies. Feel free to pull data from it for your site!

data.Name: Main BWS
data.Description: Bitcore Wallet Service (BWS) is used for Copay wallets to operate correctly. It is a powerful extension to Bitcore itself. Example API call: https://bws.zel.cash/bws/api/v2/feelevels

data.Name: Backup BWS
data.Description: Bitcore Wallet Service (BWS) is used for Copay wallets to operate correctly. It is a powerful extension to Bitcore itself. Example API call: https://bws.zel.cash/bws/api/v2/feelevels

data.Name: Backup BWS 2
data.Description: Bitcore Wallet Service (BWS) is used for Copay wallets to operate correctly. It is a powerful extension to Bitcore itself. Example API call: https://bws.zel.cash/bws/api/v2/feelevels

data.Name: Backup BWS 3
data.Description: Bitcore Wallet Service (BWS) is used for Copay wallets to operate correctly. It is a powerful extension to Bitcore itself. Example API call: https://bws.zel.cash/bws/api/v2/feelevels
